title: StandardButton Component
description: A versatile and accessible button component supporting multiple visual variants, optional icons, tooltips, and navigation/link behavior. It handles internal routing, external links, email links, and disables interactions gracefully.

propsList.name: label
propsList.description: Text label displayed inside the button.

propsList.name: callback
propsList.description: Optional function to call on button click.

propsList.name: variant
propsList.description: Visual style variant determining button layout and styling.

propsList.name: tooltip
propsList.description: Text to show as a tooltip on hover (desktop only).

propsList.name: link
propsList.description: URL or internal route to navigate to when clicked.

propsList.name: icon
propsList.description: Optional icon element to display inside the button.

propsList.name: disable
propsList.description: Disables the button interaction and styles it accordingly.

propsList.name: headertitle
propsList.description: Optional header text displayed above or alongside the label in certain variants.

propsList.name: external
propsList.description: If true, shows an external link icon and opens the link in a new tab.

propsList.name: fillContainer
propsList.description: If true, button fills its container's width and height.

propsList.name: mobile
propsList.description: Disables tooltip and adjusts interaction for mobile devices.

codesample:
<StandardButton
        headertitle="Section Title"
        label="Click Me"
        variant="withlabel"
        icon={getIcon("chevronRight")}
        callback={() => console.log("With Label clicked")}
      />
